home_admin_bash_history:
ls -la
cd /var/www/techvault
sudo systemctl restart apache2
mysql -u root -p
cat /etc/shadow
wget http://backup-server/latest-db-dump.sql
scp config.php admin@backup-server:/backups/
vi /etc/apache2/sites-available/default-ssl.conf
sudo tail -f /var/log/apache2/error.log
netstat -tulpn | grep :3306
ss -tulpn
ps aux | grep mysql
top
htop
exit
